Definition/description: No restrictions on patient type, ‘other’ Choose this if unsure about ICU type detailsDefault ICU label
Critically ill patients with primary cardiac conditions (e.g. arrhythmias, heart failure, post-cardiac arrest)
Post-cardiac surgical patients requiring intensive care (e.g. CABG, valve replacement), aka CTICU/CVICU/etc
Patients with mixed medical and surgical cardiac conditions
Critically ill post-surgical patients (e.g. abdominal surgery, trauma, vascular surgery).
Medical patients with neurological critical illness (stroke, seizure)
Surgical patients with neurological critical illness (SAH, SDH, etc)
Medical and surgical patients with neurological critical illness
Medical critical illness (predominantly respiratory failure, septic shock, GI hemorrhage, renal failure)
